parse.title: The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth/Portrayals

links.*: Battle of the Chamber of Mazarbul
The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth

wikitext.*:
The following is a list of all portrayals found in the [[Magic: The Gathering]] [[The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth|Tales of Middle-earth]] set, including the base set, the Commander product, reprints of previous Magic cards and reprints that were given a different name unique to this expansion. 

Each card is organized by the primary focus of the artwork. If it (and the card) are describing only an individual, it is organized as portraying them. If the artwork (and along with context of the card) is depicting a specific scene, than it is organized under the specific event.
